item.description:
Ok this event got rained out the last time we planned it so lets try it again.

Come on out to Captain's Corner where we can eat Seafood at Lena's, play mini "glow" golf, batting cages and Go Karts (this may or may not be availabe) then we will walk across the street to Hodgies 2 for an ice cream.

Captain's Corner has added a Go Kart track but at this writing we are not sure it is open.  But there are batting cages, "glow" golf and a really good time with friends.

 

Hope to see you all at the Captain's Corner for some summertime fun.

Remember:  If you are running late, get lost or can't find us please call the Meetup cell phone at 978-304-2811.

 

See you there

Donna & Janet
item.name: Seafood, Glow Mini Golf, Batting Cages, go carts AND Ice Cream!!!!
